Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.RemoteView
      • it.polimi.ingsw.view.CLI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class CLI
extends RemoteView
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Command line interface implementation. It includes ASCII extended chars but they will be converted for Windows OS. All the necessary data information for this class during the game is taken from the ModelView

        public NicknameMessage askNicknamePlayer()

        the nickname message

      • askGod

        public GodMessage askGod()
        Ask player to select a god among those selected by godly. Godly's god get assigned automatically with the remaining one. Quit the game typing exit or quit
        Returns:
        the god message

                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setupWorkers

        public void setupWorkers()
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Player places the workers in the board typing valid and free Slot coordinate Quit the game typing exit or quit
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

      • play

        private void play()
           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method manage the game flow after the workers setup. Quit the game typing exit or quit It sends player choices through sendEvent method of SSC, as PropertyChangeEvents Events: actionRequest to get the list of actions available for this turn endTurn to notify the end of this turn notifyAction to send the action the player perform among the available
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

      • parseCoordinateAction

        public java.util.List<Coordinate> parseCoordinateAction​(java.lang.String input)
        Parse user's action input string looking for valid couple of Coordinate.
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:
        the array list of Start and End Coordinate

      • godChoice

        private void godChoice()
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException

        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception
